    • Method Detail

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(int x,
                       int y)
        Checks if this piece can legally move to position (x,y).

        Queens may move any number of spaces in either a cardinal or a diagonal direction.

        Overrides:
        canMove in class Piece
        Parameters:
        x - - column to move to
        y - - row to move to
        Returns:
        false for blank pieces
